title: Guesthouse Daughters
resume: Guesthouse Daughters is a Korean variety show where five famous actresses and two famous comedians move in to a large guesthouse and live together. As they live together in the large guesthouse, they play various games and greet new celebrity guests. Guesthouse Daughters promises you to deliver natural looks of the famous celebrities.
